column1: Smoque BBQ////The best BBQ restaurant that I have found in Chicago in my 4 years of living here.  (And I'm from Memphis
column2: so I know my BBQ.)  The meat is tender
column4: and reasonably priced. I have tried the pulled pork
column8: and none have disappointed me thus far. The mac and cheese is fantastically buttery
column9: the fries are cooked from freshly sliced potatoes
column10: the slaw is fresh and vinegary but not too much so
column11: and if you can squeeze any room for the peach cobbler
